message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a unique opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to save even more. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering the value I place on it. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save more, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to lower the price to $750,000, which is still a significant discount from the original price. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
